name: vearml Musuem OpenVR
description:
This is a concrete implementation of the previous "Art Gallery OVR" Project. The gallery represents a not yet announced Swedish Museum. As in the successor it is possible to place images into the App Folder and view them in the gallery.

VIEW YOUR OWN PICTURES BY COPYING THEM INTO THE ROOT FOLDER

v01_04

- removed Splash Screen

- Teleportation (HTC vive, press tumb button)
